name: @lavamoat/snow
description: standardize how to recursively own newborn windows within a web app, from the context of the app itself

scripts.use-strict-prod: node -p 'fs.writeFileSync(`snow.prod.js`, `(function(){"use strict";if (typeof SNOW === "function") return;` + fs.readFileSync(`snow.prod.js`)+ `}())`) , `successfully wrapped snow.prod.js with use-strict scope`'
scripts.test: yarn test-chrome && yarn test-firefox && yarn test-safari
